author: Esoterics
text:
So what we’re saying is that every host or presenter who made a joke about someone last night deserved to be slapped?
I guess @amyschumer should’ve been slapped all night. She was funny as hell, though.

author: Esoterics
text: Every single Fresh Prince episode, Will Smith is making fun of someone’s physical appearance, stupidity, or some lacking quality. Now he’s a protector.

author: Esoterics
text: The captured Ukrainians are being placed in Whats basically a concentration camp, folks. https://t.co/ttbvCyrs8Y
